content.thinking: Let me analyze the PDF document and follow the classification workflow: ### 1. TEXT EXTRACTION From the image I can extract the following text: - "REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA" - "IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL" - "CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA" - "NUMERO 38.199.170" - "FUENTES LEON" - "APELLIDOS NORBERTO" - "NOMBRES" (appears to have a signature below) - "FECHA DE NACIMIENTO: 27-NOV-1970" - "CHIMA (SANTANDER)" - "LUGAR DE NACIMIENTO" - "1.61" (appears to be height) - "B+" (blood type) - "M" (gender - male) - "ESTATURA" "G.S. RH" "SEXO" - "03-OCT-1990 CUCUTA" (appears to be issue date and place) - "FECHA Y LUGAR DE EXPEDICION" - There's a fingerprint image - "INDICE DERECHO" - There's also a barcode at the bottom ### 2. PRIORITY CHECKS - Not BLANK: Document contains meaningful content - Not LINK_ONLY: No hyperlinks/URLs as primary content ### 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION This appears to be an official identification document issued by the Colombian government. It's a "Cédula de Ciudadanía" which is Colombia's national ID card. ### 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS This is clearly a personal identification document. It contains: - Personal biographical data (birth date, birthplace, blood type, gender) - A photo of the individual - Fingerprint - Security elements (appears to have watermarks/security features) - Official government ID number ### 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION Following the evaluation order, this document is a CECRL (Official personal identification document). It matches all the must-have indicators: - Individual identification terminology: "Identificación personal", "Cédula de Ciudadanía" - Personal biographical data: birth date/place, blood type, gender - Individual photo, signature, fingerprint references - Government-issued personal ID number with individual name - Security elements (appears to have watermarks, barcode) It perfectly matches the key pattern: "REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL", "CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA NUMERO" ### 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION I have strong evidence for this classification: - Clear must-have indicators present - Unambiguous document function (personal ID) - Contains all typical elements of a Colombian national ID card I'm very confident this is a CECRL (Official personal identification document).
